name: Bad Science Fiction
description:
The player character is controlled with mouse and keyboard. WASD to move, and Q and E to rotate the spaceship—which has undergone some sort of catastrophe so as to render it powerless, with stray barrels of starship fuel floating around. 

This is a proof of concept game, in a way. Because there are no intractables in it, it has nothing to do but explore a few rooms. I just wanted to see what I could do with changing gravity. 

Pressing escape ends the game. You can also use left shift plus either rotating key bind.
